text: Some people love to guilt trip people with real depression and IT SUCKS I don t really have any mental illness but I have two friends who had anxiety attacks and depression and it really grinds me that whenever I see social posts or people constructing words for mental illness and then indirectly implying that it s their fault if they suicide or have mental illness They would say to me that it doesn t really make them feel any better and they would actually think of themselves worse and I m really hurt whenever I see them like that and I don t know what to do
summary: Some people love to guilt trip people with mental illnesses like depression and anxiety attacks. It makes them feel worse and makes them think of themselves worse. It's hurtful and I don't know what to do about it. I have two friends who have mental illnesses.
